title: Ticket #1029: Compile with -02
description: As decided by Flightworthy 8 Dec 2009: Condor should be compiled with -O2
remarks:
2009-Dec-10 12:21:12 by tstclair:
This is the default for Ticket #779

2010-Jan-12 14:49:24 by tannenba:
This was done already for new classads (#990).

If memory serves, we need to be careful to not enable -O2 for the standard universe libraries.... will check w/ psilord to see if I am remembering correctly, as this will have a profound impact on how we resolve this ticket.

2010-Jun-18 13:12:49 by matt:
Any news on this?

2010-Sep-28 08:23:11 by tannenba:
As this is the default for the new world of cmake (#779), and we are close to making cmake the default, and the most compute-intensive part of Condor (classad matchmaking) is already -O2, I am resolving this ticket.
creator: matt
